                  abs PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  2800              CMP      r0,#0
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  da02              BGE      |L1.10|
000004  f1c00000          RSB      r0,r0,#0
000008  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L1.10|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  4770              BX       lr
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  clr_scrn PROC
;;;18     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;19     void clr_scrn(void)
00000c  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
;;;20     {
;;;21     char i;
;;;22     for (i=0;i<LCD_SIZE;i++)
;;;23     	{
;;;24     	lcd_buffer[i]=' ';

                  |L1.22|

00001c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;22
00001e  28c8              CMP      r0,#0xc8              ;22
000020  d3f9              BCC      |L1.22|
;;;25     	}
;;;26     }
000022  4770              BX       lr
;;;27     
                          ENDP

                  find PROC
;;;28     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;29     char find(char xy)
000024  4601              MOV      r1,r0
;;;30     {
;;;31     char i=0;
000026  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
;;;32     do i++;
;;;33     while ((lcd_buffer[i]!=xy)&&(i<LCD_SIZE));
00002a  4af6              LDR      r2,|L1.1028|
                  |L1.44|
00002c  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;32
000030  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;32
000032  5c13              LDRB     r3,[r2,r0]

000036  d001              BEQ      |L1.60|
000038  28c8              CMP      r0,#0xc8
00003a  d3f7              BCC      |L1.44|

;;;34     //if(i==(LCD_SIZE)) i++;
;;;35     return i;
;;;36     }

;;;37

                  bin2bcd_int PROC
;;;39     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;40     void bin2bcd_int(unsigned int in)
00003e  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;41     {
;;;42     
;;;43     char i=5;
;;;44     for(i=0;i<5;i++)

;;;45     	{
;;;46     	dig[i]=in%10;

                  |L1.74|

000054  5463              STRB     r3,[r4,r1]

;;;47     	in/=10;
;;;48     	}   
;;;49     }
000060  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;50     //-----------------------------------------------
                          ENDP

                  bcd2lcd_zero PROC
;;;51     void bcd2lcd_zero(char sig)
000062  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;52     {
;;;53     char i;
;;;54     zero_on=1;
000064  4de9              LDR      r5,|L1.1036|
000066  f04f0101          MOV      r1,#1
00006a  7029              STRB     r1,[r5,#0]
;;;55     for (i=5;i>0;i--)
00006c  f04f0105          MOV      r1,#5
;;;56     	{
;;;57     	if(zero_on&&(!dig[i-1])&&(i>sig))
000070  4be5              LDR      r3,|L1.1032|
;;;58     		{
;;;59     		dig[i-1]=0x20;
000072  f04f0620          MOV      r6,#0x20
000076  f04f0700          MOV      r7,#0                 ;54
                  |L1.122|
00007a  782a              LDRB     r2,[r5,#0]            ;57  ; zero_on
00007c  b142              CBZ      r2,|L1.144|
00007e  185a              ADDS     r2,r3,r1              ;57
000080  f8124c01          LDRB     r4,[r2,#-1]           ;57
000084  b924              CBNZ     r4,|L1.144|
000086  4281              CMP      r1,r0                 ;57
000088  d902              BLS      |L1.144|
00008a  f8026c01          STRB     r6,[r2,#-1]
00008e  e007              B        |L1.160|
                  |L1.144|
;;;60     		}
;;;61     	else
;;;62     		{
;;;63     		dig[i-1]=dig[i-1]+0x30;
000090  eb030201          ADD      r2,r3,r1
000094  f8124d01          LDRB     r4,[r2,#-1]!
000098  f1040430          ADD      r4,r4,#0x30
00009c  7014              STRB     r4,[r2,#0]
;;;64     		zero_on=0;
00009e  702f              STRB     r7,[r5,#0]
                  |L1.160|
0000a0  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1              ;55
0000a4  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;55
0000a6  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;55
0000a8  d1e7              BNE      |L1.122|
;;;65     		}	
;;;66     	}
;;;67     }             
0000aa  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;68     
                          ENDP

                  int2lcd_mmm PROC
;;;151    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;152    void int2lcd_mmm(signed short in,char xy,char des)
0000ac  b5fe              PUSH     {r1-r7,lr}
;;;153    {

;;;154    signed char i;
;;;155    char n;
;;;156    char s[10];

;;;158    char zero_on;
;;;159    char simb_num;
;;;160    
;;;161    if(in<0)

;;;162    	{
;;;163    	in=-in;

;;;165    	}
;;;166    
;;;167    for(i=0;i<10;i++)

;;;168    	{

;;;170    	in/=10;

0000dc  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;167

;;;174    simb_num=0;

;;;175    
;;;176    for (i=9;i>=0;i--)

;;;177    	{

;;;179    	     {
;;;180    	     s[i]=0x20;

                  |L1.242|

0000f8  f1bc0f00          CMP      r12,#0                ;178
0000fc  d103              BNE      |L1.262|
0000fe  4290              CMP      r0,r2                 ;178
000100  dd01              BLE      |L1.262|
000102  542e              STRB     r6,[r5,r0]
000104  e008              B        |L1.280|

;;;181    	     }
;;;182    	else 
;;;183    	     {
;;;184    	     s[i]=s[i]+0x30;

000108  f1030330          ADD      r3,r3,#0x30
00010c  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
;;;185    	     zero_on=0;
00010e  f04f0300          MOV      r3,#0
;;;186    	     simb_num++;

000116  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.280|
000118  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1              ;176
00011c  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;176
00011e  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;176
000120  dae7              BGE      |L1.242|
;;;187    	     }
;;;188    	 }
;;;189    	          
;;;190    if(minus=='-')	
000122  2f2d              CMP      r7,#0x2d
000124  d104              BNE      |L1.304|
;;;191         {
;;;192         s[simb_num++]=minus;

000128  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
00012c  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
00012e  542f              STRB     r7,[r5,r0]

;;;193         }    
;;;194    if(des)
000130  b18a              CBZ      r2,|L1.342|
;;;195         {
;;;196         for(i=simb_num;i>des;i--)
000132  b260              SXTB     r0,r4
000134  e007              B        |L1.326|
                  |L1.310|
;;;197              {
;;;198              s[i]=s[i-1];

00013a  f8133c01          LDRB     r3,[r3,#-1]
00013e  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
000140  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1              ;196
000144  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;196
                  |L1.326|
000146  4290              CMP      r0,r2                 ;196
000148  dcf5              BGT      |L1.310|
;;;199              }
;;;200         s[des]='.';

;;;201         simb_num++;

000154  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.342|
;;;202         }
;;;203    	
;;;204    n=find(xy);

000158  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;205    for (i=0;i<simb_num;i++)

;;;206    	{
;;;207         lcd_buffer[n-i]=s[i];

000162  e006              B        |L1.370|
                  |L1.356|
000164  eba00601          SUB      r6,r0,r1
000168  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
00016a  5593              STRB     r3,[r2,r6]
00016c  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1              ;205
000170  b249              SXTB     r1,r1                 ;205

000174  dbf6              BLT      |L1.356|
;;;208    	}
;;;209    }

;;;210    
                          ENDP

                  long2lcd_mmm PROC
;;;211    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;212    void long2lcd_mmm(signed long in,char xy,char des)

;;;213    {

;;;241    	     }
;;;242    	else 
;;;243    	     {
;;;244    	     s[i]=s[i]+0x30;

0001d6  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
;;;245    	     zero_on=0;

;;;246    	     simb_num++;

                  |L1.482|

;;;247    	     }
;;;248    	 }
;;;249    	          
;;;250    if(minus=='-')

;;;251         {
;;;252         s[simb_num++]=minus;

;;;262         }
;;;263

                  long2lcdyx_mmm PROC
;;;271    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;272    void long2lcdyx_mmm(signed long in,char y,char x,char des)

;;;313         }    
;;;314    if(des)
0002c8  b18b              CBZ      r3,|L1.750|
;;;315         {
;;;316         for(i=simb_num;i>des;i--)
0002ca  b260              SXTB     r0,r4
0002cc  e007              B        |L1.734|
                  |L1.718|
;;;317              {
;;;318              s[i]=s[i-1];
0002ce  eb070500          ADD      r5,r7,r0
0002d2  f8155c01          LDRB     r5,[r5,#-1]
0002d6  543d              STRB     r5,[r7,r0]
0002d8  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1              ;316
0002dc  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;316
                  |L1.734|
0002de  4298              CMP      r0,r3                 ;316
0002e0  dcf5              BGT      |L1.718|
;;;319              }
;;;320         s[des]='.';
0002e2  f04f002e          MOV      r0,#0x2e
0002e6  54f8              STRB     r0,[r7,r3]
;;;321         simb_num++;     
0002e8  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
0002ec  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.750|
;;;322         }
;;;323    	
;;;324    n=(20*y)+x;
0002ee  eb010081          ADD      r0,r1,r1,LSL #2
0002f2  eb020080          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #2
0002f6  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
;;;325    for (i=0;i<simb_num;i++)
0002f8  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
;;;326    	{
;;;327         lcd_buffer[n-i]=s[i];
0002fc  4a41              LDR      r2,|L1.1028|
0002fe  e006              B        |L1.782|
                  |L1.768|
000300  eba10500          SUB      r5,r1,r0
000304  5c3b              LDRB     r3,[r7,r0]
000306  5553              STRB     r3,[r2,r5]
000308  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;325
00030c  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;325
                  |L1.782|
00030e  42a0              CMP      r0,r4                 ;325
000310  dbf6              BLT      |L1.768|
;;;328    	}
;;;329    
;;;330    
;;;331    
;;;332    }
000312  e8bd81fe          POP      {r1-r8,pc}
;;;333    
                          ENDP

                  int2lcdyx PROC
;;;334    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;335    void int2lcdyx(unsigned short in,char y,char x,char des)
000316  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;336    {
000318  460d              MOV      r5,r1
00031a  4616              MOV      r6,r2
00031c  461c              MOV      r4,r3
;;;337    char i;
;;;338    char n;
;;;339    bin2bcd_int(in);
00031e  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
;;;340    bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
000322  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
000324  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000326  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
;;;341    i=(y*20)+x;
00032a  eb050085          ADD      r0,r5,r5,LSL #2
00032e  eb060080          ADD      r0,r6,r0,LSL #2
000332  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
;;;342    for (n=0;n<5;n++)
000334  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
;;;343    	{ 
;;;344    	if(n<des)
;;;345    		{
;;;346    		lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];
000338  4b33              LDR      r3,|L1.1032|
00033a  4d32              LDR      r5,|L1.1028|
                  |L1.828|
00033c  42a0              CMP      r0,r4                 ;344
00033e  d201              BCS      |L1.836|
000340  5c1a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r0]
000342  546a              STRB     r2,[r5,r1]
                  |L1.836|
;;;347    		}   
;;;348    	if((n>=des)&&(dig[n]!=0x20))
000344  d307              BCC      |L1.854|
000346  5c1a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r0]
000348  2a20              CMP      r2,#0x20
00034a  d004              BEQ      |L1.854|
;;;349    		{
;;;350    		if(!des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];	
00034c  b164              CBZ      r4,|L1.872|
;;;351    		else lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];
00034e  eb050601          ADD      r6,r5,r1
000352  f8062c01          STRB     r2,[r6,#-1]
                  |L1.854|
;;;352       		}   
;;;353    	i--;	
000356  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00035a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00035c  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;342
000360  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;342
000362  2805              CMP      r0,#5                 ;342
000364  d3ea              BCC      |L1.828|
;;;354    	}
;;;355    }
000366  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L1.872|
000368  546a              STRB     r2,[r5,r1]            ;350
00036a  e7f4              B        |L1.854|
;;;356    
                          ENDP

                  sub_bgnd PROC
;;;1160   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1161   void sub_bgnd(char const *adr,char xy,signed char offset)
00036c  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1162   {
00036e  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000370  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000372  4615              MOV      r5,r2
;;;1163   char temp;
;;;1164   temp=find(xy);
000374  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1165   
;;;1166   //ptr_ram=&lcd_buffer[find(xy)];
;;;1167   if(temp!=255)
000378  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
00037a  d00c              BEQ      |L1.918|
;;;1168   while (*adr)
;;;1169   	{
;;;1170   	lcd_buffer[temp+offset]=*adr++;
00037c  4a21              LDR      r2,|L1.1028|
;;;1171   	temp++;
00037e  e007              B        |L1.912|
                  |L1.896|
000380  eb000305          ADD      r3,r0,r5              ;1170
000384  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1              ;1170
000388  54d1              STRB     r1,[r2,r3]            ;1170
00038a  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
00038e  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
                  |L1.912|
000390  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]            ;1168
000392  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;1168
000394  d1f4              BNE      |L1.896|
                  |L1.918|
;;;1172       	}
;;;1173   }
000396  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1174   
                          ENDP

                  int2lcd PROC
;;;965    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;966    void int2lcd(unsigned short in,char xy,char des)
000398  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;967    {
00039a  460d              MOV      r5,r1
00039c  4614              MOV      r4,r2
;;;968    char i;
;;;969    char n;
;;;970    
;;;971    bin2bcd_int(in);
00039e  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
;;;972    bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
0003a2  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
0003a4  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0003a6  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
;;;973    i=find(xy);
0003aa  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0003ac  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;974    for (n=0;n<5;n++)
0003b0  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
;;;975    	{
;;;976       	if(!des&&(dig[n]!=' '))
0003b4  4a14              LDR      r2,|L1.1032|
;;;977       		{
;;;978       		lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];	 
0003b6  4d13              LDR      r5,|L1.1028|
                  |L1.952|
0003b8  b924              CBNZ     r4,|L1.964|
0003ba  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]            ;976
0003bc  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20              ;976
0003be  d001              BEQ      |L1.964|
0003c0  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
0003c2  e015              B        |L1.1008|
                  |L1.964|
;;;979       		}
;;;980       	else 
;;;981       		{
;;;982       		if(n<des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];
0003c4  42a1              CMP      r1,r4
0003c6  d202              BCS      |L1.974|
0003c8  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
0003ca  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
0003cc  e010              B        |L1.1008|
                  |L1.974|
;;;983       		else if (n==des)
0003ce  d108              BNE      |L1.994|
;;;984       			{
;;;985       			lcd_buffer[i]='.';
0003d0  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
0003d4  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
;;;986       			lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];
0003d6  eb050600          ADD      r6,r5,r0
0003da  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
0003dc  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
0003e0  e006              B        |L1.1008|
                  |L1.994|
;;;987       			} 
;;;988       		else if ((n>des)&&(dig[n]!=' ')) lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];   		
0003e2  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
0003e4  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
0003e6  d003              BEQ      |L1.1008|
0003e8  eb050600          ADD      r6,r5,r0
0003ec  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
                  |L1.1008|
;;;989       		}  
;;;990    		
;;;991    	i--;	
0003f0  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
0003f4  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0003f6  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1              ;974
0003fa  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;974
0003fc  2905              CMP      r1,#5                 ;974
0003fe  d3db              BCC      |L1.952|
;;;992    	}
;;;993    }
000400  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
000402  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L1.1028|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.1032|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L1.1036|
                          DCD      zero_on
                          ENDP

                  ptr_carry PROC
;;;1183   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1184   char ptr_carry(signed int in,unsigned char modul,signed int carry)
000410  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
;;;1185   {
;;;1186   signed int tempSI;
;;;1187   tempSI=in;                                                             
;;;1188   tempSI+=carry;
;;;1189   if(tempSI<0)tempSI+=modul;
000412  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000414  da01              BGE      |L1.1050|
000416  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1
000418  e003              B        |L1.1058|
                  |L1.1050|
;;;1190   else if(tempSI>=modul)tempSI-=modul;
00041a  4288              CMP      r0,r1
00041c  db01              BLT      |L1.1058|
00041e  eba00001          SUB      r0,r0,r1
                  |L1.1058|
;;;1191   
;;;1192   return (char)tempSI;
000422  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
;;;1193   }
000424  4770              BX       lr
;;;1194   
                          ENDP

                  event2ind PROC
;;;358    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;359    void event2ind(char num, char simbol)
000426  e92d4ffe          PUSH     {r1-r11,lr}
;;;360    {
00042a  4604              MOV      r4,r0
00042c  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;361    char iii;
;;;362    char dt[4],dt_[4],dt__[4];
;;;363    unsigned int tempii;    
;;;364    		
;;;365    tempii=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
00042e  f44f6060          MOV      r0,#0xe00
000432  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_int
;;;366    tempii=ptr_carry(tempii,64,-1*((signed)num));
000436  4262              RSBS     r2,r4,#0
000438  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
00043a  f7fffffe          BL       ptr_carry
;;;367    tempii*=32;
00043e  ea4f1040          LSL      r0,r0,#5
;;;368    tempii+=EVENT_LOG;
000442  f5006080          ADD      r0,r0,#0x400
000446  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;369         
;;;370    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii,dt);
000448  a902              ADD      r1,sp,#8
00044a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00044c  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;371    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+8,dt_);
000450  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
000452  f1040008          ADD      r0,r4,#8
000456  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;372    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+12,dt__);
00045a  4669              MOV      r1,sp
00045c  f104000c          ADD      r0,r4,#0xc
000460  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;373    
;;;374    iii=find(simbol);
000464  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000466  f7fffffe          BL       find
00046a  4683              MOV      r11,r0
;;;375         
;;;376    if(dt[0]=='U')
00046c  f89d0008          LDRB     r0,[sp,#8]
;;;377        	{ 
;;;378        	if(dt[2]=='R')
;;;379        		{
;;;380        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';
;;;381        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='ê';
;;;382        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='ë';
;;;383        		}
;;;384        	
;;;385    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;386    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';     		
;;;387       	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;388       	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;389    
;;;390        	if((dt_[0]==LPC_RTC->YEAR)&&(dt_[1]==LPC_RTC->MONTH)&&(dt_[2]==LPC_RTC->DOM))
000470  f8dfa5f0          LDR      r10,|L1.2660|
000474  f8df95f0          LDR      r9,|L1.2664|
000478  f04f0640          MOV      r6,#0x40              ;366
;;;391        		{
;;;392        	    	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
00047c  f04f0530          MOV      r5,#0x30
;;;393         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
000480  f04f0721          MOV      r7,#0x21
;;;394         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;395         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;396         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;397         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;398         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;399         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
000484  f04f0823          MOV      r8,#0x23
000488  f04f0420          MOV      r4,#0x20              ;385
00048c  2855              CMP      r0,#0x55              ;376
00048e  d02f              BEQ      |L1.1264|
;;;400         	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;401         	int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;402         	int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;403         	}	                   
;;;404    	else      	
;;;405              {
;;;406     		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;407         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;408         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;409         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;410         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;411         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;412         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;413         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;414         	int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;415         	int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;416         	if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;417    		sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);  
;;;418      		}	   
;;;419         }   
;;;420         
;;;421    else if(dt[0]=='P')
;;;422    	{
;;;423         lcd_buffer[iii++]='Ï';
000490  22cf              MOVS     r2,#0xcf
;;;424         lcd_buffer[iii++]='Ñ';
000492  21d1              MOVS     r1,#0xd1
000494  2850              CMP      r0,#0x50              ;421
000496  d07d              BEQ      |L1.1428|
;;;425        	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;426         lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';     		
;;;427         lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;428         lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;429         lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;430         	
;;;431         if((dt_[0]==LPC_RTC->YEAR)&&(dt_[1]==LPC_RTC->MONTH)&&(dt_[2]==LPC_RTC->DOM))
;;;432         	{
;;;433             	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;434         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;435        	    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;436        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;437        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;438         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;439         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;440         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;441             	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;442         	int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;443         	int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;444         	}	                   
;;;445        	else      	
;;;446         	{
;;;447          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;448         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;449         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;450         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;451          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;452          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;453          	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;454          	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;455          	int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;456         	int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;457          	if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;458    	 	sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);  
;;;459      		}     	
;;;460         }   
;;;461    
;;;462    else if(dt[0]=='B')
000498  2842              CMP      r0,#0x42
00049a  d07c              BEQ      |L1.1430|
;;;463        	{
;;;464        	if(dt[2]=='C')
;;;465        		{
;;;466        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Á';
;;;467        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='à';
;;;468        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='ò';
;;;469    		if(dt[1]<9)
;;;470        			{
;;;471        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x31+dt[1];
;;;472        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='À';
;;;473        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;474        			}
;;;475        		else if((dt[1]>=9)&&(dt[1]<99))
;;;476        			{
;;;477        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x30+((dt[1]+1)/10);
;;;478        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x30+((dt[1]+1)%10);
;;;479        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='À';
;;;480        			}
;;;481        		else 
;;;482        			{
;;;483        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;484        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' '; 
;;;485        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';    		
;;;486        			} 
;;;487        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;488         	
;;;489        		if((dt_[0]==LPC_RTC->YEAR)&&(dt_[1]==LPC_RTC->MONTH)&&(dt_[2]==LPC_RTC->DOM))
;;;490        			{
;;;491        		    	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;492       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;493        		    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;494        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;495        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;496       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;497       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;498       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;499       	 	    	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;500       	 		int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;501       	 		int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;502        			}	                   
;;;503        		else      	
;;;504        			{
;;;505        	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;506        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;507        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;508        	    		lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;509        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;510        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;511        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;512        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;513        			int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;514        			int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;515        	    		if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;516    			sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);  
;;;517        			}
;;;518        		}
;;;519    
;;;520        	if(dt[2]=='S')
;;;521        		{
;;;522        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Á';
;;;523        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='à';
;;;524        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='ò';
;;;525    		if(dt[1]<9)
;;;526        			{
;;;527        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x31+dt[1];
;;;528        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='À';
;;;529        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='C';
;;;530        			}
;;;531        		else if((dt[1]>=9)&&(dt[1]<99))
;;;532        			{
;;;533        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='À';
;;;534        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='C';
;;;535        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;536        			}
;;;537        		else 
;;;538        			{
;;;539        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;540        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' '; 
;;;541        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';    		
;;;542        			} 
;;;543        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;544         	
;;;545        		if((dt_[0]==LPC_RTC->YEAR)&&(dt_[1]==LPC_RTC->MONTH)&&(dt_[2]==LPC_RTC->DOM))
;;;546        			{
;;;547        		    	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;548       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;549        		    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;550        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;551        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;552       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;553       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;554       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;555       	 	    	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;556       	 		int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;557       	 		int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;558        			}	                   
;;;559        		else      	
;;;560        			{
;;;561        	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;562        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;563        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;564        	    		lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;565        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;566        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;567        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;568        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;569        			int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;570        			int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;571        	    		if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;572    			sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);  
;;;573        			}
;;;574        		}
;;;575    
;;;576        	if(dt[2]=='Z')
;;;577        		{
;;;578        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';
;;;579        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Ç';

0013a6  f8094000          STRB     r4,[r9,r0]            ;848
0013aa  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;849
0013ae  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;849
0013b0  f8094001          STRB     r4,[r9,r1]            ;849
                  |L1.5044|
0013b4  f8094000          STRB     r4,[r9,r0]            ;851
0013b8  e6aa              B        |L1.4368|
;;;854    
                          ENDP

                  community2lcd PROC
;;;855    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;856    void community2lcd(char* in,
0013ba  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;857    			char xy,
;;;858    			char flash_pos,
;;;859    			char flash_on)
;;;860    {
0013bc  4604              MOV      r4,r0
0013be  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0013c0  4616              MOV      r6,r2
0013c2  461f              MOV      r7,r3
;;;861    char temp;
;;;862    char i;
;;;863    //char n;
;;;864    
;;;865    
;;;866    i=find(xy);
0013c4  f7fffffe          BL       find
0013c8  4602              MOV      r2,r0
;;;867    
;;;868    //in1=192;
;;;869    
;;;870    //in2=34;
;;;871    
;;;872    
;;;873    
;;;874    temp=i;
0013ca  4610              MOV      r0,r2
;;;875    
;;;876    //ptr_ram=&lcd_buffer[find(xy)];
;;;877    if(temp!=255)
;;;878    while (*in)
;;;879    	{
;;;880    	lcd_buffer[temp]=*in++;
0013cc  4d71              LDR      r5,|L1.5524|
0013ce  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff              ;877
0013d0  d106              BNE      |L1.5088|
0013d2  e008              B        |L1.5094|
                  |L1.5076|
0013d4  5429              STRB     r1,[r5,r0]
0013d6  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
;;;881    	temp++;
0013da  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
0013de  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
                  |L1.5088|
0013e0  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]            ;878
0013e2  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;878
0013e4  d1f6              BNE      |L1.5076|
                  |L1.5094|
;;;882        	}
;;;883    
;;;884    
;;;885    
;;;886    if((bFL2)&&(flash_on))
0013e6  486c              LDR      r0,|L1.5528|
0013e8  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; bFL2
0013ea  2800              CMP      r0,#0
0013ec  d006              BEQ      |L1.5116|
0013ee  2f00              CMP      r7,#0
0013f0  d004              BEQ      |L1.5116|
;;;887    	{
;;;888    	lcd_buffer[i+flash_pos]=95;
0013f2  eb020106          ADD      r1,r2,r6
0013f6  f04f005f          MOV      r0,#0x5f
0013fa  5468              STRB     r0,[r5,r1]
                  |L1.5116|
;;;889    	}
;;;890    
;;;891    }
0013fc  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;892    
                          ENDP

                  ip2lcd PROC
;;;893    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;894    void ip2lcd(	short in1,
0013fe  e92d4ff0          PUSH     {r4-r11,lr}
;;;895    			short in2,
;;;896    			short in3,
;;;897    			short in4,
;;;898    			char xy,
;;;899    			char flash_pos)
;;;900    {
001402  4607              MOV      r7,r0
001404  e9dd0509          LDRD     r0,r5,[sp,#0x24]
001408  4688              MOV      r8,r1
00140a  4691              MOV      r9,r2
00140c  469a              MOV      r10,r3
;;;901    char i;
;;;902    //char n;
;;;903    
;;;904    //bin2bcd_int(in);
;;;905    //bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
;;;906    i=find(xy);
00140e  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;907    
;;;908    //in1=192;
;;;909    
;;;910    //in2=34;
;;;911    
;;;912    if((flash_pos==1)&&(bFL2))
001412  4b61              LDR      r3,|L1.5528|
;;;913    	{
;;;914    	lcd_buffer[i-12]=' ';
001414  2120              MOVS     r1,#0x20
001416  4c5f              LDR      r4,|L1.5524|
;;;915    	lcd_buffer[i-13]=' ';
;;;916    	lcd_buffer[i-14]=' ';
;;;917    	}
;;;918    else 
;;;919    	{
;;;920    	lcd_buffer[i-12]=0x30+(in1%10);
001418  220a              MOVS     r2,#0xa
;;;921    	lcd_buffer[i-13]=0x30+(in1/10)%10;
;;;922    	lcd_buffer[i-14]=0x30+(in1/100);
00141a  f04f0c64          MOV      r12,#0x64
00141e  2d01              CMP      r5,#1                 ;912
001420  d109              BNE      |L1.5174|
001422  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]            ;912  ; bFL2
001424  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.5174|
001426  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0              ;914
00142a  f1a6060e          SUB      r6,r6,#0xe            ;914
00142e  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]            ;914
001430  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]            ;915
001432  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]            ;916
001434  e017              B        |L1.5222|
                  |L1.5174|
001436  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2             ;920
00143a  fb027e1b          MLS      lr,r2,r11,r7          ;920
00143e  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0              ;920
001442  f10e0e30          ADD      lr,lr,#0x30           ;920
001446  f806ec0c          STRB     lr,[r6,#-0xc]         ;920
00144a  fb9bfef2          SDIV     lr,r11,r2             ;921
00144e  fb02bb1e          MLS      r11,r2,lr,r11         ;921
001452  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30         ;921
001456  f806bc0d          STRB     r11,[r6,#-0xd]        ;921
00145a  fb97f7fc          SDIV     r7,r7,r12
00145e  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001462  f8067c0e          STRB     r7,[r6,#-0xe]
                  |L1.5222|
;;;923    	}
;;;924    
;;;925    if((flash_pos==2)&&(bFL2))
001466  2d02              CMP      r5,#2
001468  d109              BNE      |L1.5246|
00146a  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
00146c  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.5246|
;;;926    	{
;;;927    	lcd_buffer[i-8]=' ';
00146e  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001472  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
001476  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;928    	lcd_buffer[i-9]=' ';
001478  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;929    	lcd_buffer[i-10]=' ';
00147a  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
00147c  e017              B        |L1.5294|
                  |L1.5246|
;;;930    	}
;;;931    else 
;;;932    	{
;;;933    	lcd_buffer[i-8]=0x30+(in2%10);
00147e  fb98f7f2          SDIV     r7,r8,r2
001482  fb028b17          MLS      r11,r2,r7,r8
001486  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
00148a  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
00148e  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30
001492  f886b002          STRB     r11,[r6,#2]
;;;934    	lcd_buffer[i-9]=0x30+(in2/10)%10;
001496  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2
00149a  fb02771b          MLS      r7,r2,r11,r7
00149e  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
0014a2  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;935    	lcd_buffer[i-10]=0x30+(in2/100);
0014a4  fb98f7fc          SDIV     r7,r8,r12
0014a8  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
0014ac  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.5294|
;;;936    	}
;;;937    
;;;938    if((flash_pos==3)&&(bFL2))
0014ae  2d03              CMP      r5,#3
0014b0  d109              BNE      |L1.5318|
0014b2  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
0014b4  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.5318|
;;;939    	{
;;;940    	lcd_buffer[i-4]=' ';
0014b6  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
0014ba  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
0014be  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;941    	lcd_buffer[i-5]=' ';
0014c0  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;942    	lcd_buffer[i-6]=' ';
0014c2  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
0014c4  e017              B        |L1.5366|
                  |L1.5318|
;;;943    	}
;;;944    else 
;;;945    	{
;;;946    	lcd_buffer[i-4]=0x30+in3%10;
0014c6  fb99f7f2          SDIV     r7,r9,r2
0014ca  fb029817          MLS      r8,r2,r7,r9
0014ce  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
0014d2  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
0014d6  f1080830          ADD      r8,r8,#0x30
0014da  f8868002          STRB     r8,[r6,#2]
;;;947    	lcd_buffer[i-5]=0x30+(in3/10)%10;
0014de  fb97f8f2          SDIV     r8,r7,r2
0014e2  fb027718          MLS      r7,r2,r8,r7
0014e6  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
0014ea  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;948    	lcd_buffer[i-6]=0x30+(in3/100);
0014ec  fb99f7fc          SDIV     r7,r9,r12
0014f0  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
0014f4  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.5366|
;;;949    	}
;;;950    
;;;951    if((flash_pos==4)&&(bFL2))
0014f6  2d04              CMP      r5,#4
0014f8  d109              BNE      |L1.5390|
0014fa  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
0014fc  b13b              CBZ      r3,|L1.5390|
;;;952    	{
;;;953    	lcd_buffer[i]=' ';
0014fe  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
;;;954    	lcd_buffer[i-1]=' ';
001500  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4
001502  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2
001506  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;955    	lcd_buffer[i-2]=' ';
001508  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]
                  |L1.5386|
;;;956    	}
;;;957    else 
;;;958    	{
;;;959    	lcd_buffer[i]=0x30+in4%10;
;;;960    	lcd_buffer[i-1]=0x30+(in4/10)%10;
;;;961    	lcd_buffer[i-2]=0x30+(in4/100);
;;;962    	}
;;;963    }
00150a  e8bd8ff0          POP      {r4-r11,pc}
                  |L1.5390|
00150e  fb9af1f2          SDIV     r1,r10,r2             ;959
001512  fb02a311          MLS      r3,r2,r1,r10          ;959
001516  f1030330          ADD      r3,r3,#0x30           ;959
00151a  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]            ;959
00151c  fb91f3f2          SDIV     r3,r1,r2              ;960
001520  fb021113          MLS      r1,r2,r3,r1           ;960
001524  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4              ;960
001526  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2              ;960
00152a  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;960
00152e  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]            ;960
001530  fb9af1fc          SDIV     r1,r10,r12            ;961
001534  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;961
001538  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]            ;961
00153a  e7e6              B        |L1.5386|
;;;964    
                          ENDP

                  long2lcdhyx PROC
;;;995    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;996    void long2lcdhyx(unsigned long in,char y,char x)
00153c  b517              PUSH     {r0-r2,r4,lr}
;;;997    {
;;;998    char i;
;;;999    char n;
;;;1000   
;;;1001   i=(20*y)+x;
00153e  eb010081          ADD      r0,r1,r1,LSL #2
001542  eb020080          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #2
001546  b2c2              UXTB     r2,r0
;;;1002   
;;;1003   n=*((char*)&in);
001548  f89d3000          LDRB     r3,[sp,#0]
;;;1004   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
00154c  4813              LDR      r0,|L1.5532|
00154e  f003010f          AND      r1,r3,#0xf
001552  5c44              LDRB     r4,[r0,r1]
001554  490f              LDR      r1,|L1.5524|
001556  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1005   i--;
001558  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
00155c  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1006   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
00155e  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
001562  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
001564  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1007   i--;
001566  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
00156a  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1008   
;;;1009   n=*(((char*)&in)+1);
00156c  f89d3001          LDRB     r3,[sp,#1]
;;;1010   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001570  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
001574  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
001576  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1011   i--;
001578  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
00157c  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1012   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
00157e  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
001582  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
001584  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1013   i--;
001586  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
00158a  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1014   
;;;1015   n=*(((char*)&in)+2);
00158c  e008              B        |L1.5536|
00158e  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L1.5520|
                          DCD      sm_mont
                  |L1.5524|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.5528|
                          DCD      bFL2
                  |L1.5532|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L1.5536|
0015a0  f89d3002          LDRB     r3,[sp,#2]
;;;1016   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
0015a4  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
0015a8  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
0015aa  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1017   i--;
0015ac  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
0015b0  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1018   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
0015b2  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
0015b6  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
0015b8  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1019   i--;
0015ba  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
0015be  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
;;;1020   
;;;1021   n=*(((char*)&in)+3);
0015c0  f89d2003          LDRB     r2,[sp,#3]
;;;1022   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
0015c4  f002040f          AND      r4,r2,#0xf
0015c8  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
0015ca  54cc              STRB     r4,[r1,r3]
;;;1023   i--;
0015cc  f1a30301          SUB      r3,r3,#1
0015d0  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
;;;1024   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
0015d2  eb001012          ADD      r0,r0,r2,LSR #4
0015d6  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
0015d8  54c8              STRB     r0,[r1,r3]
;;;1025   i--;
;;;1026   }
0015da  bd1e              POP      {r1-r4,pc}
;;;1027   
                          ENDP

                  char2lcdhyx PROC
;;;1041   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1042   void char2lcdhyx(char in,char y,char x)
0015dc  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1043   {
;;;1044   char i;
;;;1045   
;;;1046   i=(20*y)+x;
0015de  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
0015e2  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
0015e6  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
;;;1047   
;;;1048   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in%16];
0015e8  4ab3              LDR      r2,|L1.6328|
0015ea  f000030f          AND      r3,r0,#0xf
0015ee  5cd4              LDRB     r4,[r2,r3]
0015f0  4bb2              LDR      r3,|L1.6332|
0015f2  545c              STRB     r4,[r3,r1]
;;;1049   i--;
0015f4  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
0015f8  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
;;;1050   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in/16];
0015fa  eb021010          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSR #4
0015fe  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
001600  5458              STRB     r0,[r3,r1]
;;;1051   i--;
;;;1052   }
001602  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;1053   
                          ENDP

                  pointer_set PROC
;;;1099   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1100   void pointer_set(char num_of_first_row)
001604  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1101   {
;;;1102   if(sub_ind==index_set)lcd_buffer[num_of_first_row*20]=1;
001606  49ae              LDR      r1,|L1.6336|
001608  2401              MOVS     r4,#1
00160a  4bac              LDR      r3,|L1.6332|
00160c  f9912001          LDRSB    r2,[r1,#1]  ; a_ind
001610  f9911004          LDRSB    r1,[r1,#4]  ; a_ind
001614  428a              CMP      r2,r1
001616  d104              BNE      |L1.5666|
001618  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
00161c  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]
;;;1103   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+1))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+1)*20]=1;
;;;1104   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+2))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+2)*20]=1;
;;;1105   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+3))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+3)*20]=1;
;;;1106   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+4))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+4)*20]=1;
;;;1107   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+5))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+5)*20]=1;
;;;1108   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+6))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+6)*20]=1;
;;;1109   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+7))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+7)*20]=1;
;;;1110   }
001620  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.5666|
001622  1c4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#1              ;1103
001624  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1103
001626  d106              BNE      |L1.5686|
001628  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1103
00162c  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1103
001630  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1103
001634  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.5686|
001636  1c8d              ADDS     r5,r1,#2              ;1104
001638  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1104
00163a  d106              BNE      |L1.5706|
00163c  f1000002          ADD      r0,r0,#2              ;1104
001640  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1104
001644  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1104
001648  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.5706|
00164a  1ccd              ADDS     r5,r1,#3              ;1105
00164c  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1105
00164e  d106              BNE      |L1.5726|
001650  f1000003          ADD      r0,r0,#3              ;1105
001654  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1105
001658  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1105
00165c  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.5726|
00165e  1d0d              ADDS     r5,r1,#4              ;1106
001660  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1106
001662  d106              BNE      |L1.5746|
001664  f1000004          ADD      r0,r0,#4              ;1106
001668  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1106
00166c  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1106
001670  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.5746|
001672  1d4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#5              ;1107
001674  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1107
001676  d106              BNE      |L1.5766|
001678  f1000005          ADD      r0,r0,#5              ;1107
00167c  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1107
001680  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1107
001684  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.5766|
001686  1d8d              ADDS     r5,r1,#6              ;1108
001688  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1108
00168a  d106              BNE      |L1.5786|
00168c  f1000006          ADD      r0,r0,#6              ;1108
001690  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1108
001694  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1108
                  |L1.5784|
001698  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.5786|
00169a  1dc9              ADDS     r1,r1,#7              ;1109
00169c  428a              CMP      r2,r1                 ;1109
00169e  d1fb              BNE      |L1.5784|
0016a0  f1000007          ADD      r0,r0,#7              ;1109
0016a4  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1109
0016a8  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1109
0016ac  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1111   
                          ENDP

                  tree_down PROC
;;;1113   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1114   void tree_down(signed char offset_ind,signed char offset_sub_ind)
0016ae  4b85              LDR      r3,|L1.6340|
;;;1115   {
;;;1116   ind_pointer--;
0016b0  881a              LDRH     r2,[r3,#0]  ; ind_pointer
0016b2  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
;;;1117   ind_pointer+=offset_ind;
0016b6  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
0016b8  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
0016ba  8018              STRH     r0,[r3,#0]
;;;1118   a_ind=b_ind[ind_pointer];
0016bc  4a82              LDR      r2,|L1.6344|
0016be  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
0016c2  4402              ADD      r2,r2,r0
0016c4  487e              LDR      r0,|L1.6336|
0016c6  6813              LDR      r3,[r2,#0]
0016c8  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; a_ind
0016ca  7912              LDRB     r2,[r2,#4]
0016cc  7102              STRB     r2,[r0,#4]
;;;1119   
;;;1120   sub_ind+=offset_sub_ind;
0016ce  7842              LDRB     r2,[r0,#1]  ; a_ind
0016d0  4411              ADD      r1,r1,r2
0016d2  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;1121   }
0016d4  4770              BX       lr
;;;1122   
                          ENDP

                  tree_up PROC
;;;1123   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1124   void tree_up(char tind, char tsub_ind, char tindex_set, char tsub_ind1)
0016d6  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1125   {
;;;1126   b_ind[ind_pointer++]=a_ind;
0016d8  4d7a              LDR      r5,|L1.6340|
0016da  f9b54000          LDRSH    r4,[r5,#0]  ; ind_pointer
0016de  f1040601          ADD      r6,r4,#1
0016e2  802e              STRH     r6,[r5,#0]
0016e4  4d78              LDR      r5,|L1.6344|
0016e6  eb040484          ADD      r4,r4,r4,LSL #2
0016ea  4425              ADD      r5,r5,r4
0016ec  4c74              LDR      r4,|L1.6336|
0016ee  6826              LDR      r6,[r4,#0]  ; a_ind
0016f0  602e              STR      r6,[r5,#0]
0016f2  7926              LDRB     r6,[r4,#4]  ; a_ind
0016f4  712e              STRB     r6,[r5,#4]
;;;1127   ind=(i_enum)tind;
0016f6  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]
;;;1128   sub_ind=tsub_ind;
0016f8  7061              STRB     r1,[r4,#1]
;;;1129   index_set=tindex_set;
0016fa  7122              STRB     r2,[r4,#4]
;;;1130   sub_ind1=tsub_ind1;
0016fc  70a3              STRB     r3,[r4,#2]
;;;1131   }
0016fe  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;1132   
                          ENDP

                  bgnd_par PROC
;;;1133   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1134   void bgnd_par(char const *ptr0,char const *ptr1,char const *ptr2,char const *ptr3)
001700  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;1135   {
001704  4680              MOV      r8,r0
001706  460f              MOV      r7,r1
001708  4616              MOV      r6,r2
;;;1136   char i,*ptr_ram;
;;;1137   clr_scrn();
00170a  f7fffffe          BL       clr_scrn
;;;1138   
;;;1139   ptr_ram=lcd_buffer;
00170e  4c6b              LDR      r4,|L1.6332|
;;;1140   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
001710  f04f0500          MOV      r5,#0
                  |L1.5908|
;;;1141   	{
;;;1142   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr0++;
001714  f8180b01          LDRB     r0,[r8],#1
001718  f8040b01          STRB     r0,[r4],#1
00171c  f1050501          ADD      r5,r5,#1              ;1140
001720  b2ed              UXTB     r5,r5                 ;1140
001722  2d14              CMP      r5,#0x14              ;1140
001724  d3f6              BCC      |L1.5908|
;;;1143   	}
;;;1144   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
001726  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.5930|
;;;1145   	{
;;;1146   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr1++;
00172a  f8171b01          LDRB     r1,[r7],#1
00172e  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
001732  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1144
001736  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1144
001738  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1144
00173a  d3f6              BCC      |L1.5930|
;;;1147   	}
;;;1148   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
00173c  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.5952|
;;;1149   	{
;;;1150   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr2++;
001740  f8161b01          LDRB     r1,[r6],#1
001744  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
001748  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1148
00174c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1148
00174e  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1148
001750  d3f6              BCC      |L1.5952|
;;;1151   	}
;;;1152   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
001752  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.5974|
;;;1153   	{
;;;1154   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr3++;
001756  f8131b01          LDRB     r1,[r3],#1
00175a  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
00175e  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1152
001762  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1152
001764  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1152
001766  d3f6              BCC      |L1.5974|
;;;1155   	}
;;;1156   
;;;1157   
;;;1158   }
001768  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
;;;1159   
                          ENDP

                  show_mess PROC
;;;1175   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1176   void show_mess(char* p1, char* p2, char* p3, char* p4,int m_sec)
00176c  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1177   {
00176e  9c02              LDR      r4,[sp,#8]
;;;1178   bgnd_par(p1,p2,p3,p4);
001770  f7fffffe          BL       bgnd_par
;;;1179   tree_up(iSM,sub_ind,sub_ind1,sub_ind2);
001774  4852              LDR      r0,|L1.6336|
001776  78c3              LDRB     r3,[r0,#3]  ; a_ind
001778  7882              LDRB     r2,[r0,#2]  ; a_ind
00177a  7841              LDRB     r1,[r0,#1]  ; a_ind
00177c  2099              MOVS     r0,#0x99
00177e  f7fffffe          BL       tree_up
;;;1180   ret((char)(m_sec/100));
001782  2064              MOVS     r0,#0x64
001784  fb94f0f0          SDIV     r0,r4,r0
001788  e8bd4010          POP      {r4,lr}
00178c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00178e  f7ffbffe          B.W      ||ret||
;;;1181   }
;;;1182   
                          ENDP

                  event_data2ind PROC
;;;1195   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1196   void event_data2ind(char num, char simbol)
001792  e92d43fe          PUSH     {r1-r9,lr}
;;;1197   {
001796  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;1198   char iii;
;;;1199   char dt[4],dt_[4],dt__[4];
;;;1200   unsigned int tempii;    
;;;1201   		
;;;1202   /*tempii=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
;;;1203   tempii=ptr_carry(tempii,64,-1*((signed)num));*/
;;;1204   tempii=(signed)num;
;;;1205   tempii*=32;
001798  ea4f1040          LSL      r0,r0,#5
;;;1206   tempii+=EVENT_LOG;
00179c  f5006080          ADD      r0,r0,#0x400
0017a0  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;1207        
;;;1208   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii,dt);
0017a2  a902              ADD      r1,sp,#8
0017a4  4620              MOV      r0,r4
0017a6  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1209   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+8,dt_);
0017aa  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
0017ac  f1040008          ADD      r0,r4,#8
0017b0  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1210   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+12,dt__);
0017b4  4669              MOV      r1,sp
0017b6  f104000c          ADD      r0,r4,#0xc
0017ba  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1211   
;;;1212   iii=find(simbol);
0017be  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0017c0  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1213   
;;;1214   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
0017c4  4c3d              LDR      r4,|L1.6332|
0017c6  f04f0620          MOV      r6,#0x20
0017ca  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
0017ce  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
0017d0  5426              STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
;;;1215   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
0017d2  f04f0730          MOV      r7,#0x30
0017d6  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
0017da  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0017dc  5467              STRB     r7,[r4,r1]
;;;1216   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
0017de  f04f0821          MOV      r8,#0x21
0017e2  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
0017e6  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
0017e8  f8048000          STRB     r8,[r4,r0]
;;;1217   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
0017ec  f04f0940          MOV      r9,#0x40
0017f0  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
0017f4  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0017f6  f8049001          STRB     r9,[r4,r1]
;;;1218   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
0017fa  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
0017fe  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001800  5426              STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
;;;1219   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
001802  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
001806  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001808  5466              STRB     r6,[r4,r1]
;;;1220   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
00180a  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
00180e  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001810  5427              STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
;;;1221   lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
001812  f04f0223          MOV      r2,#0x23
001816  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
00181a  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0
00181c  5462              STRB     r2,[r4,r1]
;;;1222   int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
00181e  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]
001822  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
001826  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21
00182a  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1223   int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
00182e  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]
001832  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
001834  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23
001836  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1224   if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
00183a  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]
00183e  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
001840  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc
001842  d303              BCC      |L1.6220|
001844  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1
001848  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]
                  |L1.6220|
;;;1225   sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0); 
00184c  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]
001850  491e              LDR      r1,|L1.6348|
001852  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
001854  eb010080          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #2
001858  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
00185a  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
;;;1226   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';		
00185e  f1050001          ADD      r0,r5,#1
001862  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001864  5566              STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1227   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
001866  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
00186a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00186c  5427              STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
;;;1228   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
00186e  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
001872  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001874  f8048001          STRB     r8,[r4,r1]
;;;1229   lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
001878  f04f023a          MOV      r2,#0x3a
00187c  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
001880  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001882  5422              STRB     r2,[r4,r0]
;;;1230   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
001884  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
001888  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00188a  5467              STRB     r7,[r4,r1]
;;;1231   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
00188c  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
001890  b2cd              UXTB     r5,r1
001892  f8049000          STRB     r9,[r4,r0]
;;;1232   int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
001896  f89d0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]
00189a  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
00189e  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21
0018a2  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1233   int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
0018a6  f89d0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]
0018aa  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
0018ac  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
0018ae  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1234      		     		
;;;1235   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
0018b2  5566              STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1236   }	
0018b4  e8bd83fe          POP      {r1-r9,pc}
                          ENDP

                  |L1.6328|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L1.6332|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.6336|
                          DCD      a_ind
                  |L1.6340|

                  |L1.6344|

                  |L1.6348|

                          AREA ||area_number.2||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.2||, ||.text||
                  int2lcd_m PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  460d              MOV      r5,r1
000004  4614              MOV      r4,r2
000006  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000008  da04              BGE      |L2.20|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  ea6f0000          MVN      r0,r0
00000e  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
000012  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L2.20|
000014  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
000018  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
000020  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000022  f7fffffe          BL       find
000026  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
000028  d022              BEQ      |L2.112|
00002a  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
00002e  4d12              LDR      r5,|L2.120|
000030  4a12              LDR      r2,|L2.124|
                  |L2.50|
000032  42a1              CMP      r1,r4
000034  d202              BCS      |L2.60|
000036  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
000038  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
00003a  e011              B        |L2.96|
                  |L2.60|
00003c  d108              BNE      |L2.80|
00003e  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
000042  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
000044  eb020600          ADD      r6,r2,r0
000048  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
00004a  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
00004e  e007              B        |L2.96|
                  |L2.80|
000050  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
000052  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000054  d004              BEQ      |L2.96|
000056  b164              CBZ      r4,|L2.114|
000058  eb020600          ADD      r6,r2,r0
00005c  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
                  |L2.96|
000060  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000064  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000066  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1
00006a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00006c  2905              CMP      r1,#5
00006e  d3e0              BCC      |L2.50|
                  |L2.112|
000070  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L2.114|
000072  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
000074  e7f4              B        |L2.96|
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000076  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L2.120|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L2.124|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.3||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.3||, ||.text||
                  int2lcd_mm PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  460c              MOV      r4,r1
000004  4615              MOV      r5,r2
000006  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000008  da02              BGE      |L3.16|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  f1c00000          RSB      r0,r0,#0
00000e  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L3.16|
000010  f04f062d          MOV      r6,#0x2d
000014  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
000018  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
000020  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000022  f7fffffe          BL       find
000026  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
00002a  4a1a              LDR      r2,|L3.148|
00002c  4c1a              LDR      r4,|L3.152|
                  |L3.46|
00002e  b97d              CBNZ     r5,|L3.80|
000030  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000032  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000034  d00c              BEQ      |L3.80|
000036  1857              ADDS     r7,r2,r1
000038  787f              LDRB     r7,[r7,#1]
00003a  2f20              CMP      r7,#0x20
00003c  d106              BNE      |L3.76|
00003e  2e2d              CMP      r6,#0x2d
000040  d104              BNE      |L3.76|
000042  eb040c00          ADD      r12,r4,r0
000046  4637              MOV      r7,r6
000048  f80c7c01          STRB     r7,[r12,#-1]
                  |L3.76|
00004c  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
00004e  e017              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.80|
000050  42a9              CMP      r1,r5
000052  d202              BCS      |L3.90|
000054  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000056  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
000058  e012              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.90|
00005a  d108              BNE      |L3.110|
00005c  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
000060  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
000062  eb040700          ADD      r7,r4,r0
000066  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000068  f8073c01          STRB     r3,[r7,#-1]
00006c  e008              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.110|
00006e  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000070  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000072  d004              BEQ      |L3.126|
000074  eb040700          ADD      r7,r4,r0
000078  f8073c01          STRB     r3,[r7,#-1]
00007c  e000              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.126|
00007e  2e2d              CMP      r6,#0x2d
                  |L3.128|
000080  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000084  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000086  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1
00008a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00008c  2905              CMP      r1,#5
00008e  d3ce              BCC      |L3.46|
000090  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000092  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L3.148|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L3.152|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.4||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.4||, ||.text||
                  char2lcdh PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000004  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000006  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  4a07              LDR      r2,|L4.40|
00000c  f004010f          AND      r1,r4,#0xf
000010  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000012  4906              LDR      r1,|L4.44|
000014  540b              STRB     r3,[r1,r0]
000016  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  eb021214          ADD      r2,r2,r4,LSR #4
000020  7812              LDRB     r2,[r2,#0]
000022  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]
000024  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000026  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L4.40|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L4.44|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.5||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.5||, ||.text||
                  int2lcdhyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00000c  4b0f              LDR      r3,|L5.76|
00000e  f000020f          AND      r2,r0,#0xf
000012  4c0f              LDR      r4,|L5.80|
000014  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
000016  5462              STRB     r2,[r4,r1]
000018  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00001c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00001e  ea4f1210          LSR      r2,r0,#4
000022  f002000f          AND      r0,r2,#0xf
000026  5c18              LDRB     r0,[r3,r0]
000028  5460              STRB     r0,[r4,r1]
00002a  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00002e  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
000030  ea4f1112          LSR      r1,r2,#4
000034  f001020f          AND      r2,r1,#0xf
000038  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
00003a  5422              STRB     r2,[r4,r0]
00003c  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000040  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000042  ea4f1111          LSR      r1,r1,#4
000046  5c59              LDRB     r1,[r3,r1]
000048  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
00004a  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L5.76|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L5.80|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.6||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.6||, ||.text||
                  char2lcdbyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2cc              UXTB     r4,r1
00000c  4921              LDR      r1,|L6.148|
00000e  f0000201          AND      r2,r0,#1
000012  5c8d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r2]
000014  f1a40201          SUB      r2,r4,#1
000018  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
00001a  4a1f              LDR      r2,|L6.152|
00001c  5515              STRB     r5,[r2,r4]
00001e  ea4f0450          LSR      r4,r0,#1
000022  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
000026  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
000028  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
00002c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00002e  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000030  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000034  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
000038  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
00003a  f1a00301          SUB      r3,r0,#1
00003e  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
000040  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
000042  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000046  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
00004a  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
00004c  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
000050  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000052  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000054  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000058  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
00005c  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
00005e  f1a00301          SUB      r3,r0,#1
000062  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
000064  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
000066  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
00006a  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
00006e  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
000070  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
000074  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000076  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000078  ea4f0354          LSR      r3,r4,#1
00007c  f0030401          AND      r4,r3,#1
000080  5d0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r4]
000082  f1a00401          SUB      r4,r0,#1
000086  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
000088  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
00008a  ea4f0053          LSR      r0,r3,#1
00008e  5c08              LDRB     r0,[r1,r0]
000090  5510              STRB     r0,[r2,r4]
000092  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L6.148|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L6.152|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
